item.title: HTML Ordered List Offset
item.description: This week at the office I’ve been on a coding hiatus and just doing a lot of copy placement and markup. The client requested having a numbered list of categories separated by type headers. I added markup as such: %ul %li %h2 Video %ol %li Animation %li Documentary %li Music Video %li Narrative %li Poetry/Experimental %li Collaboration %li UNICEF Challenge %li %h2 Print %ol %li Photo Collection/Digital Story/Photo Essay %li Poster/Collage/Campaign Output:
